heading: About RollerCoaster.dev
intro: RollerCoaster.dev is a toolkit by and for neurodivergent minds, reimagining how we track progress, set goals, and celebrate our journeys.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We build neuro-centered tools—rooted in neurodivergent lived experience—to empower flexible, self-paced learning and growth. Traditional productivity apps assume linear progress and fixed schedules. We don't.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: A community-led collective of designers, developers, and neurodivergent collaborators committed to building better digital tools.

flexibility.name: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Support ebbs, flows, and rest without judgment.

clarity.name: Clarity
clarity.description: Visual feedback, simple UI, optional deeper info.

community.name: Community
community.description: Shared journeys, mutual support, lived experience at the core.

benefits.title: How You Benefit
benefits.item1: Set goals that fit your rhythm.
benefits.item2: Document achievements with open, verifiable badges.
benefits.item3: Visualize your growth in ways that feel meaningful.
benefits.item4: Connect with others who understand the journey.
